title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: LangChain’s Ollama integration lets you call any Ollama-hosted model as an LLM or chat component with two lines of code.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server—browser & Node.js ready.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: jmorganca/ollama-docker
summary: Minimal Docker Compose stack for CPU & GPU (CUDA) Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker.

title: richawo/ollama-chains
summary: Experimental LangChain-style chaining library built specifically for Ollama models.

title: mchiang/ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-rust/ollama-rs
summary: Idiomatic Rust crate wrapping the Ollama REST API with Tokio/async support.

title: ollama/ollama-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfiles, adapters, and quantized GGUFs for Ollama.

title: kevinw/ollama-streamlit
summary: Quick Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama over localhost:11434.

title: ollama-discord/ollama-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel.

title: ollama-php/ollama-php
summary: Lightweight PHP client for Ollama with PSR-18 HTTP abstraction.

title: ollama-go/ollama-go
summary: Community Go SDK exposing Ollama endpoints with context cancellation.

title: ollama-csharp/ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 library and CLI tool for chatting with Ollama models from C#.

title: ollama-cli/ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama featuring readline, syntax highlighting, and history.

title: ollama-obsidian/ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models inside your notes.

title: ollama-vscode/ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to run Ollama prompts in-editor and insert completions.

title: ollama-embeddings/ollama-embeddings
summary: Collection of pre-made Modelfiles optimized for generating embeddings with Ollama.

title: ollama-rag/ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain to chat with your documents offline.
